subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Peña’s three-run homer capped a six-run rally in the ninth inning that carried the Tampa Bay Rays past the Cleveland Indians, 10-7, for a thrilling victory.
snippet: Carlos Peña’s three-run homer capped a six-run rally in the ninth inning that carried the Tampa Bay Rays past the Cleveland Indians, 10-7, for a thrilling victory.
